participant_1.background:
My most valued possession is my health, because without it I cannot do the things that make me happy.
My children are my whole world, and I would love to find someone to share my love of Christmas with.
i m allergic to milk.
I do not wish to discuss my parents' death.
i have never traveled outside of the united states.

participant_2.background:
Rita Hayworth is my idol and I like to work out to stay in shape.
My favorite type of food is locally sourced, organic food.
my favorite genre of music is rock.
I like to play pretend with my daughter.
i recently had knee surgery.

content.text: Hello there! I hope you are doing well today.
Hi! I'm doing okay, thanks for asking.
What are some of your hobbies?
I like to work out, listen to rock music, and play pretend with my daughter.
That sounds like a lot of fun! Do you have any favorite places to go for local, organic food?
I like to go to the farmers market. I recently had knee surgery, so I've been walking a lot more.
Oh no, I hope you're feeling better! I'm glad you're finding ways to stay active.
Thanks! I'm doing much better. I'm starting to feel like myself again.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my children, cooking, and reading.
That sounds like a great way to spend your time. Do you have any favorite books?
I love reading historical fiction and mysteries.
I love mysteries too! I've been reading a lot of Agatha Christie lately.
Me too! She's one of my favorite authors.
I'm glad you're enjoying her books. I'm sure you've read And Then There Were None, but if you haven't, I highly recommend it.
I haven't read that one yet! I'll have to check it out.
